thread.title: Good news for holiday shoppers: Target to match online prices
thread.title_full: Good news for holiday shoppers: Target to match online prices | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Good news for holiday shoppers: Target to match online prices
text:
Target is pushing out a new promise to shoppers: The company will match online prices with 29 of its biggest rivals.
Those companies include Amazon, Walmart, Toys R Us and Best Buy, Fortune reported.
>> Read more trending stories
It will also allow up to 14 days after purchase to get the price adjustment, Reuters reported.
That's up from seven days.
Walmart started matching prices of online competitors last year.
